items.name: Breakfast
items.description: Rice, beans, scramble eggs, cheese, lettuce, tomatoes, cilantro, onions, sour cream, and sweet corn. Choice of chorizo, or any choice below.

items.name: Quesadilla
items.description: Choice of meat, tomatoes, rice, cheese dip, sour cream, lettuce

items.name: Burrito
items.description: Choice of meat, beans, rice, sweet corn, lettuce, cheese, sour cream, onion, cilantro, tomatoes

items.name: King Nachos
items.description: Choice of meat, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, cilantro, jalapeños, beans, sour cream, cheese dip

items.name: Quesadela
items.description: Choice of meat, bell pepper, lettuce, tomatoes, grilled onions, rice, cheese dip, sour cream

items.name: Torta
items.description: Choice of meat, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, cilantro, jalapeños, beans, cheese, avocado, mayonnaise or sour cream

items.name: Taco
items.description: Choice of meat, Mexican style (cilantro and onions) or American style (lettuce, cheese, tomatoes and sour cream)

items.name: Meats
items.description: Grilled Steak, Grilled Chicken, Ground Beef, Spicy Pork (pastor), Pork (carnitas), Mexican Sausage (chorizo), Veggie
